class  TXMPMeta< tStringObj >
 API for access to the XMP Toolkit core services. More...

Detailed Description

API for access to the XMP Toolkit core services.

TXMPMeta is the template class providing the core services of the XMP Toolkit. It must be instantiated with a string class such as std::string. Read the Toolkit Overview for information about the overall architecture of the XMP API, and the documentation for XMP.hpp for specific instantiation instructions.

Access these functions through the concrete class, SXMPMeta.
